channel.title: Flysa sword
channel.description:
Well before anyone says this...The sword is plain and has a big blade. I might work on this again later on and add more detail.
Meta:
[img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/3672/flysameta.png[/img]
Datmaker:
[img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/9759/flysasworddat.png[/img]

item.title: Flysa sword
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:5, topic:325464”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=421787.msg3097142#msg3097142 date=1263426879]

i sort of ignored the last issue with your swords.
but youre starting to make a habit of making the hilt of the swords flat.
try making them more 3d…

I just learned how to round them up so yeah…

Looks good, i might post a few prims in a few day.

O.T. is it just me or does the blade kindof curve along the cutting edge, it looks like the middle is one of the narrowest parts.

It’s just the view of the model :
[/quote]

Making them not “flat” isn’t much of the problem considering if it was added to a RS client, no one would notice.[/quote]

this isnt a screen shot of it in a client… so we do notice its flatness.
this section isnt completely based on adding it to your client, just it being camptible with the client IF you were to add it.

Read full topic

item.title: Flysa sword
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:4, topic:325464”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=421787.msg3097131#msg3097131 date=1263425766]
i sort of ignored the last issue with your swords.
but youre starting to make a habit of making the hilt of the swords flat.
try making them more 3d…
[/quote]
I just learned how to round them up so yeah…

Looks good, i might post a few prims in a few day.

O.T. is it just me or does the blade kindof curve along the cutting edge, it looks like the middle is one of the narrowest parts.

It’s just the view of the model :[/quote]

Making them not “flat” isn’t much of the problem considering if it was added to a RS client, no one would notice.

Read full topic
